Package model

Class Photo

java.lang.Object
model.Photo
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Photo
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
The Photo class is the class for storing photo information including file path, caption, date-time, and more.
Author:
Seok Yim, Mae Khaled
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    java.util.ArrayList<Album> albums
    the ArrayList of Album that contains all the albums that this photo is in
    java.lang.String caption
    the caption for this photo
    java.time.LocalDateTime datetime
    the date-time of when this photo was last modified in the local file system
    java.lang.String filePath
    the filePath for this photo
    java.util.ArrayList<Tag> tags
    the ArrayList of Tag that contains all the tags corresponding to thie photo

  • Method Details

    • createPhoto

      public static Photo createPhoto​(java.lang.String filePath, Album album) throws java.io.IOException
      Creates a Photo instance.
      Parameters:
      filePath - the file path for this photo
      album - the Album instance to which this photo will belong
      Returns:
      the Photo instance that corresponds to the provided file path
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if an input or output exception occurred

    • addTag

      public int addTag​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String value, User user)
      Adds a tag to this photo. Assumes that the tag type/name given already exists.
      Parameters:
      name - tag name
      value - tag value
      user - the current user
      Returns:
      0 if successful, 1 if failed due to duplicate combination issue, 2 if failed due to multiplicity issue

    • deleteTag

      public boolean deleteTag​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String value)
      Deletes a tag from the ArrayList of tags.
      Parameters:
      name - tag name
      value - tag value
      Returns:
      true if successful, false otherwise

    • modifyCaption

      public void modifyCaption​(java.lang.String caption)
      Modifies the caption of this photo.
      Parameters:
      caption - the caption that this photo will start having

    • copyToAlbum

      public int copyToAlbum​(java.lang.String album_name, java.util.ArrayList<Album> given_albums)
      Copies this photo to another album.
      Parameters:
      album_name - the name of the album which this photo will be copied to
      given_albums - the ArrayList of all the Albums for this user
      Returns:
      0 if successful, 1 if the same photo already exists in the album specified, 2 if the album name given is not an actual album name

    • moveToAlbum

      public int moveToAlbum​(java.lang.String album_name, Album tbr_album, java.util.ArrayList<Album> given_albums)
      Moves this photo to another album
      Parameters:
      album_name - the name of the album to which this photo will be moved
      tbr_album - the current album that will no longer have this photo after moving it
      given_albums - the ArrayList of all the Albums for this user
      Returns:
      0 if successful, 1 if the same photo already exists in the album specified, 2 if the album name given is not an actual album name
